text:
We use Automox here for patching servers. The third party patch support is
pretty robust and the pricing was very reasonable; the complete feature set
includes the ability to execute PowerShell scripts and connect to endpoints via
VNC, which would potentially eliminate the need for something like TeamViewer
for remote support. 
Thanks, 
Joe Harder 
Sr. Systems Administrator 
p 616-600-4154 | f 616-588-6218 
 
northpointe.com
 
[cid:image001.png@01DA5B38.979017B0]
[cid:image002.png@01DA5B38.979017B0]

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] RE: If not Ivanti, what?
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from joe.harder@northpointe.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
We use Automox here for patching servers. The third party patch support is
pretty robust and the pricing was very reasonable; the complete feature set
includes the ability to execute PowerShell scripts and connect to endpoints via
VNC, which would potentially eliminate the need for something like TeamViewer
for remote support. 
Thanks, 
Joe Harder 
Sr. Systems Administrator
